long_description: When you're moving fast and light and still want dependable waterproof, breathable protection, carry the men's Salomon Minim Rain Jacket. It adds only 9.9 oz. to your pack and tons of reassurance. ClimaPro(TM) 10/10 nylon is windproof as well as waterproof. 3D panel hood with glued visor features hidden neck adjusters and back adjustment. Articulated sleeves are designed to move with the body, increasing comfort and range of motion. Pit zips offer instant venting of excess heat. Angled cuffs maximize coverage; molded cuff tabs adjust to seal out rain or let in airflow. Zippered hand pockets and zippered chest pocket secure essentials. Salomon Minim Rain Jacket for men has an adjustable hem to seal out wind.
short_description: When you're moving fast and light and still want dependable waterproof, breathable protection, carry the men's Salomon Minim Rain Jacket. It adds only 9.9 oz. to your pack and tons of reassurance.
